one.title: Who is responsible for the processing of your data?
one.text: SERVICIOS ESPECIALIZADOS EN ATENCIÓN COMERCIAL, PUBLICITARIA Y ELECTRÓNICA, S. DE R.L. también identificada como Flyway Today.

two.title: For what purpose do we process your personal data?
two.text: At Flyway Today we process the information you provide us with in order to manage the contractual relationship that unites us, manage the sending of the information you request from us and/or provide interested parties with offers of our services and/or products of interest to them.

three.title: How long will we keep your personal data?
three.text: Your data will be kept for the minimum time necessary for the correct provision of the service offered, as well as to meet the responsibilities that may arise from it and any other legal requirement.

four.title: What is the legitimacy for the processing of your data?
four.text: La base legal para el tratamiento de sus datos personales puede ser la ejecución de una relación contractual potencial y/o suscrita, el interés legítimo, la habilitación legal y/o el consentimiento del propio interesado. Los datos que le solicitamos son adecuados, pertinentes y estrictamente necesarios y en ningún caso está obligado a facilitárnoslos, pero su negativa podrá afectar a la finalidad del servicio o la imposibilidad de prestarlo.

five.title: To which recipients will your data be communicated?
five.text: Flyway Today will not transfer or communicate your data to any third party, except in the cases legally provided for, in which the interested party has expressly authorized us or in which said transfer is totally necessary to be able to provide the contracted service.

six.title: What are your rights when you provide us with your data?
six.text: The data protection rights of which the interested parties are entitled are: Right to request access to personal data relating to the interested party. Right to rectification or deletion. Right of opposition. Right to request the limitation of your treatment. Right to data portability. Right not to be subject to automated decisions, that is, without human intervention. The owners of the personal data obtained may exercise their rights to protect personal data by sending a written communication to the registered office of Flyway Today or to the email address enabled for this purpose, soporte@flywaytoday.com, including in both cases a photocopy of their credential. to vote, passport or other equivalent identification document.

seven.title: Can I withdraw consent
seven.text: You have the possibility and the right to withdraw consent for any specific purpose granted at the time, without affecting the legality of the treatment based on the consent prior to its withdrawal.

eight.title: Where can I complain if I believe that my data is not being processed correctly?
eight.text: If any interested party considers that their data is not being processed correctly by Flyway Today, they can direct their complaints to support@flywaytoday.com or to the corresponding data protection authority, being the National Institute of Transparency, Access to Information and Data Protection. Personal information indicated in the national territory, https://home.inai.org.mx/

nine.title: Security and updating of your personal data
nine.text: In order to safeguard the security of your personal data, we inform you that Flyway Today has adopted all the necessary technical and organizational measures to guarantee the security of the personal data provided. All this to avoid alteration, loss, and/or unauthorized processing or access, as required by regulations, although absolute security does not exist. It is important that, so that we can keep your personal data updated, you always inform us when there is a change to it.

ten.title: Confidentiality
ten.text: Flyway Today le informa que sus datos serán tratados con el máximo celo y confidencialidad por todo el personal que intervenga en cualquiera de las fases del tratamiento. No cederemos ni comunicaremos a ningún tercero sus datos, excepto en los casos legalmente previstos, o salvo que el interesado nos hubiera autorizado expresamente.

becomeFiveFiguresAgent.name: Facebook and Instagram Ads for the travel industry.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.description: Unlock the potential of your travel business with expert insights on leveraging Facebook and Instagram Ads. Elevate your brand, capture a wider audience, and generate high-converting leads effortlessly. Get XXXX usd included to spend on ads.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.objective: Provide you with all the tools, methods, and necessary strategies to grow a new brand in the travel industry and take it to the 5-figure mark in record time by implementing proven strategies to increase your business profits and turn your customers into repeat clients.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.requirements: No prior experience required, only recommended to know how to use any web browser such as Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Safari.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.learning: You'll have strategies to attract new clients, methods to follow changing trends, know how to use your social networks to attract new clients, and have a flow through which you can turn any customer into a repeat customer, thereby dramatically boosting your profits.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.communication: At any time during the course, you can communicate at no cost with our team and receive immediate guidance to implement any of the different lessons in the company of a professional.
becomeFiveFiguresAgent.responsability: The courses offered by Flywaytoday, specifically 'Transformation: Become a 5-Figure Travel Agent' are designed to provide information on how to become a successful travel agent. While we strive to provide accurate and valuable content, individual results may vary. Flywaytoday cannot guarantee specific financial outcomes. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment, conduct additional research, and seek professional advice if deemed necessary before making business decisions based on the course content. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with any entities mentioned in the course, and any trademarks, logos, or brand names used are the property of their respective owners.

bussinessWithGoogleAds.name: How to become a Five Figure Travel Agent: Proven Strategies Unveiled.
bussinessWithGoogleAds.description: Unlock rapid success in the travel industry with our course—zero to five figures. No hidden secrets, just techniques that guarantee results. Join now and propel your travel business to five-figure excellence!
bussinessWithGoogleAds.objective: To equip you with all the necessary knowledge to run all types of campaigns on the Google Ads platform and its different networks such as Search, YouTube, Gmail, among others, with a simple method, turning you into a user who knows the deep details of the different available campaigns.
bussinessWithGoogleAds.requirements: No prior experience is required, only familiarity with using any web browser like Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Safari is recommended.
bussinessWithGoogleAds.learning: You will be able to run all available campaign types that Google offers on its advertising platform to attract more customers, create offers for existing customers, and expand your brand using the power of different platforms available within Google like Google Search, YouTube, Gmail, etc.
bussinessWithGoogleAds.communication: At any time during the course, you can communicate at no cost with our team and receive immediate advice to implement any of the different lessons in the company of a professional.
bussinessWithGoogleAds.responsability: The courses offered by Flywaytoday, specifically 'Boost Your Travel Business Profits with Google Ads' aim to provide knowledge and skills in the realm of advertising on Google. While we strive to deliver accurate and updated content, the ever-changing nature of advertising technologies may lead to occasional discrepancies. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with Google or any other platform mentioned in the course. Any trademarks, logos, or brand names used are the property of their respective owners. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment and seek professional advice if deemed necessary before implementing strategies based on the course content.

courseFacebookAds.name: Grow Your Business with Facebook, Instagram & WhatsApp Advertising
courseFacebookAds.description: This course will provide you with the necessary knowledge to run advertising campaigns for your brand/company using the Meta Ads platform, which includes Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp. You'll learn to attract more customers, increase sales, and maximize profits by creating attractive and visible ads for a growing user base.
courseFacebookAds.objective: To equip students with the necessary knowledge to execute online advertising campaigns with various objectives within the Meta Ads platform. Additionally, it aims to provide tools for content creation and effective advertising on social media.
courseFacebookAds.requirements: No prior experience is required, but familiarity with web browsers like Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, or Safari is recommended.
courseFacebookAds.atCourseEnd: Upon completion of the course, you'll be capable of executing any type of campaign with any available objective on the Meta Ads platform. You'll be able to attract new customers and launch exclusive offers for existing customers or individuals engaging with your Facebook, Instagram, or website.
courseFacebookAds.communication: Throughout the course, you'll have access to communicate at no cost with our team for immediate guidance and practical implementation of various lessons with a professional.
courseFacebookAds.responsability: The courses offered by Flywaytoday, specifically 'Grow your business with Facebook, Instagram & Whatsapp advertising (Meta Ads & Whatsapp Business),' are intended to provide valuable knowledge and skills in the field of social media advertising. While we strive to provide accurate and updated content, the changing dynamics of online platforms may lead to occasional discrepancies. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, or any other platform mentioned in the course. Any trademarks, logos, or brand names used are the property of their respective owners. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment and conduct additional research before implementing strategies based on the course content.

contentKing.name: Digital Conquer: Running Ads using Google, Youtube, Facebook, Instagram & Whatsapp.
contentKing.description: Harness the advertising power of the internet's largest platforms. Maximize customer attraction and conversion by mastering Meta Ads & Google Ads. Boost your brand visibility across Facebook, Instagram, Google, and YouTube. Join now for unparalleled insights and SEO-friendly strategies to elevate your online presence!
contentKing.objective: Master Meta Ads, comprehensively understanding the various campaign types available within the Meta Ads platform and how each can be implemented in a strategy to generate 5 figures within a travel business.
contentKing.requirements: No prior experience required, but familiarity with web browsers such as Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, or Safari is recommended.
contentKing.atCourseEnd: You will have developed a strong understanding of implementing strategies within the travel industry to attract more customers, offer attractive packages to existing clients or visitors, and you'll master the post-sales process to engage both new and recurring customers.
contentKing.communication: Throughout the course, you'll have free access to communicate with our team, obtain immediate guidance, and practically implement various lessons with a professional.
contentKing.responsability: Flywaytoday's 'Content King' package includes courses on how to generate five figures for your business using Facebook, Instagram, and Whatsapp, among other relevant aspects. While we strive to provide valuable content, individual results may vary. Flywaytoday cannot guarantee specific financial outcomes. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment, conduct additional research, and seek professional advice if deemed necessary before making business decisions based on the package content. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, or any other entity mentioned in the package.

outreachAgent.name: Outreach Agent: boost your sales and brand with the help of Google and proven strategies in the Travel industry.
outreachAgent.description: In this exciting course, dive into the fascinating world of digital advertising with Google Ads (Search, Youtube, Gmail) and start implementing the ability to reach more customers with the ability to grow your current brand/company to a 5-figure one with proven strategies, methods and tools.
outreachAgent.objective: Give new agents the ability to place advertising on the most popular networks to attract more customers, unveil attractive offers to current customers and visitors to increase their profitability along with proven strategies for growing a new business in the travel industry.
outreachAgent.requirements: No previous experience is required, just recommended to know how to use any web browser like chrome, internet explorer, mozilla firefox, safari.
outreachAgent.atCourseEnd: You will have perfected specific strategies that will take your travel business to consistently reach 5 figures, and you will have the ability to constantly attract new clients as well as offer attractive material to your current clients and visitors to ultimately turn them into repeat customers.
outreachAgent.communication: At any time during the course you will be able to communicate free of charge with our team and receive immediate advice to put into practice any of the different lessons in the company of a professional.
outreachAgent.responsability: Flywaytoday's 'Outreach Agent' package includes courses on how to boost your sales and brand using Google and proven strategies in the travel industry. While we strive to provide accurate and valuable content, individual results may vary. Flywaytoday cannot guarantee specific financial outcomes. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment, conduct additional research, and seek professional advice before making business decisions based on the package content. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with Google or any other entity mentioned in the package.

threeSixtyAgent.name: 360 Agent: Master online advertising, sales strategies and turn your travel business from 0 to 5 figures in record time.
threeSixtyAgent.description: Our most complete course, Decide and Control the direction of your travel brand with Google Ads(search, Youtube, Gmail) plus the potential of Meta Ads (Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp), all while we guide you to become a 5-figure travel agent. Discover specific and proven strategies, tools and methods made to boost your brand, its reach, sales and profits.Discover the path to take your travel agency to consistent 5-figure revenues.
threeSixtyAgent.objective: Boost your brand/business using digital advertising and our business management expertise within the travel industry, we will combine the reach of the most popular online advertising platforms with our knowledge of over 20,000 agents who today own a consistent revenue business.
threeSixtyAgent.requirements: No previous experience is required, it is only recommended to know how to use any web browser such as chrome, internet explorer, mozilla firefox, safari.
threeSixtyAgent.atCourseEnd: You will have perfected specific strategies that will take your travel business to reach 5 figures consistently, and you will have the necessary knowledge to run any type of advertising campaign on the most popular ad platforms, upload attractive offers to get new clients, close new sales and even turn your clients into recurring clients.
threeSixtyAgent.communication: At any time during the course you will be able to communicate free of charge with our team and receive immediate advice to put into practice any of the different lessons in the company of a professional.
threeSixtyAgent.responsability: Flywaytoday's '360 Agent' package includes all our courses: Google Ads, Meta Ads & Whatsapp Business, and 'How to Become a Five-Figure Travel Agent.' While we strive to provide accurate and valuable content, individual results may vary. Flywaytoday cannot guarantee specific financial outcomes. Participants are advised to exercise critical judgment, conduct additional research, and seek professional advice before making business decisions based on the package content. Flywaytoday is not affiliated with any entity mentioned in the package. Any trademarks, logos, or brand names used are the property of their respective owners.
